children.value: An Edit is a field used to show and alter texts. Also known as UITextFIeld on Swift and input on HTML. There also is some variations, like Outlined Edit, Calculator Edit, Password Edit, etc, that are shown on the example bellow.

Type Name Description
String clearValueStr stores the value that will be used by the clear() method to switch texts
Byte captalise

used to modify the the letter case from the text within the Edit:

  • ALL_NORMAL: normal case
  • ALL_LOWER: all lowercase
  • ALL_UPPER: all uppercase
String caption The Edit's placeholder text
### Methods
Creates a box for user input
Creates a box for user input, but with a mask
Used to change the mode value to one of the accepted ones by the mode constants, without masking. To enable masking, you should use the setMode
method, and pass the mode you wish and true on the second parameter
will enable or disable the Edit. Can be used as a way to make sure the user don't modify something that was already saved on server and can't be modified without proper authorization

Returns the text within the Edit, without care for the mask. It's important to note that in the case where there is mask, the characters from the mask will come with the user input, to get only the user input you should be using the getTextWithoutMask
Is used to limit the characters number the user can digit on the text field
Is used to set if there should or not exist prediction on this Edit, it is, however set to true by default.
